CustomField.description: Number of business days left excluding holidays.
CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( (First_of_Next_Month__c -1) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( (First_of_Next_Month__c -1) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of business days left excluding holidays.
CustomField.label: Number of Calling Days Left This Month
